introduction.en:
StreamVault Pro is a professional-grade live stream recording and management platform built upon the open-source StreamCap project. This enhanced version adds advanced features including intelligent transcript management, enterprise license system, modern UI design, and comprehensive platform support. By integrating FFmpeg and advanced stream processing technologies, it efficiently and reliably records live streams from over 40 major platforms including Douyin, TikTok, Kuaishou, Huya, Douyu, Bilibili, and more.

Developed by: tmwgsicp | Original Author: ihmily
introduction.zh_CN:
StreamVault Pro是一款基于开源StreamCap项目构建的专业级直播流录制和管理平台。这个增强版本添加了高级功能，包括智能文案管理、企业许可证系统、现代化UI设计和全面的平台支持。通过集成FFmpeg和先进的流处理技术，高效、稳定地录制抖音、TikTok、快手、虎牙、斗鱼、B站等40+主流平台的直播流。

开发者：tmwgsicp | 原作者：ihmily
